languages.text: {n}Ваши пальцы касаются теплого дерева. Вы достаете крохотную шкатулку, украшавшую ваши покои. Открыв ее, вы видите сложенную записку, в которой написано: "Спасибо". Джай с улыбкой заглядывает вам в глаза.{/n} "Мне очень понравился подарок, шерин".

{n}Your fingers brush against something warm. You take out a tiny decorative wooden box that usually sits on display in your quarters. You open it and find a note folded inside that reads: "Thank you." Jae looks into your eyes, smiling.{/n} "I loved the gift, shereen."
languages.original_text: {n}Ваши пальцы касаются теплого дерева. Вы достаете крохотную шкатулку, украшавшую ваши покои. Открыв ее, вы видите сложенную записку, в которой написано: "Спасибо". Джай с улыбкой заглядывает вам в глаза.{/n} "Мне очень понравился подарок, шерин".

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}你的之间碰到了某件暖暖的东西。你抽出手，掏出了一个小巧的装饰木盒，这个木盒通常都摆在你的房间里。你打开盒子，发现里面有一张折好的字条，上面写着“谢谢你”。婕伊凝视着你的双眼，微笑着。{/n}“我很喜欢你送我的礼物，亲爱的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Your fingers brush against something warm. You take out a tiny decorative wooden box that usually sits on display in your quarters. You open it and find a note folded inside that reads: "Thank you." Jae looks into your eyes, smiling.{/n} "I loved the gift, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}你的之间碰到了某件暖暖的东西。你抽出手，掏出了一个小巧的装饰木盒，这个木盒通常都摆在你的房间里。你打开盒子，发现里面有一张折好的字条，上面写着“谢谢你”。婕伊凝视着你的双眼，微笑着。{/n}“我很喜欢你送我的礼物，亲爱的。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}指が何か温かいものに触れる。いつもは部屋に飾ってある小さな木製の飾り箱を取り出す。箱を開けると、中に折り畳まれたメモが入っていた。そこには「ありがとう」と書かれている。ジェイは微笑みながらあなたの目を見つめる。{/n}「贈り物ありがとう、シャリーン」
languages.original_text: {n}Your fingers brush against something warm. You take out a tiny decorative wooden box that usually sits on display in your quarters. You open it and find a note folded inside that reads: "Thank you." Jae looks into your eyes, smiling.{/n} "I loved the gift, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}指が何か温かいものに触れる。いつもは部屋に飾ってある小さな木製の飾り箱を取り出す。箱を開けると、中に折り畳まれたメモが入っていた。そこには「ありがとう」と書かれている。ジェイは微笑みながらあなたの目を見つめる。{/n}「贈り物ありがとう、シャリーン」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tus dedos tocan algo templado. Sacas una cajita decorativa que normalmente está expuesta en tus aposentos, la abres y encuentras una nota doblada en la que está escrito: «Muchas gracias». Jae te mira sonriendo a los ojos.{/n} «Me ha encantado el regalo, shereen».
languages.original_text: {n}Your fingers brush against something warm. You take out a tiny decorative wooden box that usually sits on display in your quarters. You open it and find a note folded inside that reads: "Thank you." Jae looks into your eyes, smiling.{/n} "I loved the gift, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tus dedos tocan algo templado. Sacas una cajita decorativa que normalmente está expuesta en tus aposentos, la abres y encuentras una nota doblada en la que está escrito: «Muchas gracias». Jae te mira sonriendo a los ojos.{/n} «Me ha encantado el regalo, shereen».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Vos doigts tombent sur quelque chose de chaud. Vous sortez une jolie petite boîte en bois qui décore habituellement vos quartiers. En l'ouvrant, vous y trouvez un message plié contenant un simple mot : « Merci. » Jae vous regarde dans les yeux en souriant.{/n} « Le cadeau m'a beaucoup plu, shereen. »
languages.original_text: {n}Your fingers brush against something warm. You take out a tiny decorative wooden box that usually sits on display in your quarters. You open it and find a note folded inside that reads: "Thank you." Jae looks into your eyes, smiling.{/n} "I loved the gift, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vos doigts tombent sur quelque chose de chaud. Vous sortez une jolie petite boîte en bois qui décore habituellement vos quartiers. En l'ouvrant, vous y trouvez un message plié contenant un simple mot : « Merci. » Jae vous regarde dans les yeux en souriant.{/n} « Le cadeau m'a beaucoup plu, shereen. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Deine Finger ertasten etwas Warmes. Du holst ein dekoratives Holzkästchen hervor, das normalerweise in deinem Quartier liegt. Du öffnest es und findest darin einen gefalteten Zettel, auf dem steht: "Danke." Jae schaut dir in die Augen und lächelt.{/n} "Ich liebe Euer Geschenk, Shereen."
languages.original_text: {n}Your fingers brush against something warm. You take out a tiny decorative wooden box that usually sits on display in your quarters. You open it and find a note folded inside that reads: "Thank you." Jae looks into your eyes, smiling.{/n} "I loved the gift, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Finger ertasten etwas Warmes. Du holst ein dekoratives Holzkästchen hervor, das normalerweise in deinem Quartier liegt. Du öffnest es und findest darin einen gefalteten Zettel, auf dem steht: "Danke." Jae schaut dir in die Augen und lächelt.{/n} "Ich liebe Euer Geschenk, Shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Parmakların sıcak bir şeye sürtünüyor. Normalde odandaki rafta duran, küçük, dekoratif, ahşap kutuyu çıkarıyorsun. Açtığında içinde katlanmış bir not buluyorsun: "Teşekkürler." Jae, gözlerinin içine bakıp gülümsüyor.{/n} "Hediyeyi çok beğendim şirinim."
languages.original_text: {n}Your fingers brush against something warm. You take out a tiny decorative wooden box that usually sits on display in your quarters. You open it and find a note folded inside that reads: "Thank you." Jae looks into your eyes, smiling.{/n} "I loved the gift, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Parmakların sıcak bir şeye sürtünüyor. Normalde odandaki rafta duran küçük, dekoratif, ahşap kutuyu çıkarıyorsun. Açıyorsun ve içinde katlanmış bir not buluyorsun: "Teşekkürler." Jae gözlerinin içine bakıyor ve gülümsüyor.{/n} "Hediyeyi çok beğendim şirinim."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
